name: MMM-FlightTracker
description: MagicMirror module that uses ADS-B systems to track nearby planes

scripts.data: npm run data-airlines && npm run data-aircrafts
scripts.data-aircrafts: mkdir -p data && curl -o data/aircrafts.zip https://junzis.com/adb/download && unzip data/aircrafts.zip aircraft_db.csv -d data && mv data/aircraft_db.csv data/aircrafts.csv && rm -rf data/aircrafts.zip

author: Thomas Bouron <tbouron@gmail.com>
